name: Locked Rooms DEMO
description:
Mobile release coming soon maybe?

V "Hello, I am V"

V "I have you trapped in a room"

V "Consider this room, a DEMO to see if your smart enough to escape."

V "Have fun, or don't, I don't really care"

R "Y-you wont go through with this, YOU WON'T WIN!"

V "Oh, but I already have..."
